verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Bb
Lord of Love
You have won my heart
Your love forever will endure
Lord of Love
You have won my heart
Your love forever will endure

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Ev'ry moment ev'ry hour
You remain a faithful tower
In Your arms I rest secure
Lord of Love You have won my heart
Your love forever will endure

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Oh Lord Your love
Forever will endure
